TopicTitle: How do you move the navball?

Articles.Content: I saw in a thread (can't remember what thread) where someone had the navball off to the left and they said they dragged it there.  How might a person have done that?

Hit ESC.

Click Settings.

Scroll to the bottom.

It's the last slider.
When you have the navball visible (when you're in command of a vessel) hit esc to bring up the menu. Click on settings and scroll down to flight UI elements, adjust position as desired.

You can also embiggen and ensmallen the navball in that same menu.

I usually ensmallen mine to 90%.
